import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Portfolio = () => { const [activeFilter, setActiveFilter] = useState('*'); const projects = [ { id: 1, title: "Floricultura Web", title_key: "project_floricultura", category: "Website", filter: "web", stack: "frontend-only", image: "/assets/img/portfolio/Floricultura-Web.png", github: "https://github.com/MatheusAbib/Floricultura-Web", live: "https://matheusabib.github.io/Floricultura-Web/", description: "Site responsivo para floricultura com carrinho de compras e filtros", tags: ["HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript"] }, { id: 2, title: "Jornal de Receitas", title_key: "project_receitas", category: "Website", filter: "web", stack: "fullstack", image: "/assets/img/portfolio/Jornal-de-Receitas.png", github: "https://github.com/MatheusAbib/Jornal-de-Receitas", live: "https://jornal-de-receitas-b6ti.onrender.com", description: "Sistema completo com cadastro de receitas, busca e categorias", tags: ["HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript", "Java", "MySQL"] }, { id: 3, title: "Dashboard de Vendas", title_key: "project_dashboard", category: "Web Tool", filter: "motion", stack: "fullstack", image: "/assets/img/portfolio/Dashboard.png", github: "https://github.com/MatheusAbib/Dashboard-Vendas", live: "https://dashboard-vendas.cleverapps.io/", description: "Dashboard interativo com gráficos e análise de dados de vendas", tags: ["HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript", "Java", "MySQL", "Charts"] }, { id: 4, title: "E-Commerce - Livros Online", title_key: "project_livros", category: "Website", filter: "web", stack: "fullstack", image: "/assets/img/portfolio/Livraria-Online.png", github: "https://github.com/MatheusAbib/e-commerce-livraria", preview: "/assets/img/portfolio/Livraria-Online.png", description: "Loja virtual completa com carrinho, checkout e sistema de pedidos", tags: ["HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript", "Java", "MySQL"] }, { id: 5, title: "Calendário", title_key: "project_calendario", category: "Web Tool", filter: "motion", stack: "frontend-only", image: "/assets/img/portfolio/Calendario.png", github: "https://github.com/MatheusAbib/Calendario", live: "https://matheusabib.github.io/Calendario/", description: "Calendário interativo com navegação entre meses e anos", tags: ["HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript", "Date API"] }, { id: 6, title: "Jogo da Forca", title_key: "project_forca", category: "FUN", filter: "brand", stack: "frontend-only", image: "/assets/img/portfolio/Jogo-da-Forca.png", github: "https://github.com/MatheusAbib/Jogo-da-Forca", live: "https://matheusabib.github.io/Jogo-da-Forca/", description: "Jogo clássico da forca com múltiplas categorias de palavras", tags: ["HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript"] }, { id: 7, title: "CRUD - Formulário de Cadastro", title_key: "project_crud", category: "Web Tool", filter: "motion", stack: "fullstack", image: "/assets/img/portfolio/CRUD-Cadastro.png", github: "https://github.com/MatheusAbib/Formulario-Cliente", preview: "/assets/img/portfolio/CRUD-Cadastro.png", description: "Sistema completo de cadastro com Create, Read, Update e Delete", tags: ["HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript", "Java", "MySQL"] }, { id: 8, title: "Meus Dashboards Power BI", title_key: "project_dashboards", category: "Links", filter: "links", stack: "frontend-only", image: "/assets/img/portfolio/Tela-Power-BI.png", github: "https://github.com/MatheusAbib/Tela-de-Links-PowerBI", live: "https://matheusabib.github.io/Tela-de-Links-PowerBI/", description: "Página de links para dashboards Power BI com visualizações de dados", tags: ["HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript"] }, { id: 9, title: "Mapa de Tarefas", title_key: "project_tarefas", category: "Web Tool", filter: "motion", stack: "frontend-only", image: "/assets/img/portfolio/Mapa-de-Tarefas.png", github: "https://github.com/MatheusAbib/Mapa-de-Tarefas", live: "https://matheusabib.github.io/Mapa-de-Tarefas/", description: "Gerenciador de tarefas com drag and drop e categorias", tags: ["HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript"] }, { id: 10, title: "UNO", title_key: "project_uno", category: "FUN", filter: "brand", stack: "frontend-only", image: "/assets/img/portfolio/UNO.png", github: "https://github.com/MatheusAbib/UNO", live: "https://matheusabib.github.io/UNO/", description: "Versão digital do clássico jogo de cartas UNO", tags: ["HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript"] }, { id: 11, title: "Editor de Imagem", title_key: "project_editor", category: "Web Tool", filter: "motion", stack: "frontend-only", image: "/assets/img/portfolio/Editor-de-Fotos.png", github: "https://github.com/MatheusAbib/Editor-de-Imagem", live: "https://matheusabib.github.io/Editor-de-Imagem/", description: "Editor de imagens no navegador com múltiplos filtros e ajustes", tags: ["HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript", "Canvas API"] }, { id: 12, title: "Bloco de Notas", title_key: "project_notas", category: "Web Tool", filter: "motion", stack: "frontend-only", image: "/assets/img/portfolio/Bloco-de-Notas.png", github: "https://github.com/MatheusAbib/Bloco-de-Notas", live: "https://matheusabib.github.io/Bloco-de-Notas/", description: "Aplicação de notas com persistência local e formatação", tags: ["HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript"] }, { id: 13, title: "Dona Sucos - Loja de Sucos", title_key: "project_sucos", category: "Website", filter: "web", stack: "frontend-only", image: "/assets/img/portfolio/Dona-Sucos.png", github: "https://github.com/MatheusAbib/Loja-de-Sucos", live: "https://matheusabib.github.io/Loja-de-Sucos/", description: "Site para loja de sucos naturais com cardápio interativo", tags: ["HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript"] }, { id: 14, title: "Tocador de Música", title_key: "project_musica", category: "FUN", filter: "brand", stack: "frontend-only", image: "/assets/img/portfolio/Tocador-de-Musica.png", github: "https://github.com/MatheusAbib/Tocador-de-Musica", live: "https://matheusabib.github.io/Tocador-de-Musica/", description: "Player de música com controles, playlist e visualizador", tags: ["HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript", "Web Audio API"] }, { id: 15, title: "To Do List", title_key: "project_todolist", category: "Web Tool", filter: "motion", stack: "angular-badge", image: "/assets/img/portfolio/To-Do-List.png", github: "https://github.com/MatheusAbib/Gerenciador-de-Tarefas", preview: "/assets/img/portfolio/To-Do-List.png", description: "Aplicação de tarefas desenvolvida com Angular e TypeScript", tags: ["HTML", "SCSS", "TypeScript", "Docker"] }, { id: 16, title: "Diário de Personagens", title_key: "project_personagens", category: "FUN", filter: "brand", stack: "frontend-only", image: "/assets/img/portfolio/Diario-de-Personagens.png", github: "https://github.com/MatheusAbib/Diario-de-personagens", live: "https://matheusabib.github.io/Diario-de-personagens/", description: "Caderno digital para criação e organização de personagens de RPG", tags: ["HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript"] }, { id: 17, title: "Meus Projetos Figma", title_key: "project_figma_links", category: "Links", filter: "links", stack: "frontend-only", image: "/assets/img/portfolio/Tela-Figma.png", github: "https://github.com/MatheusAbib/Tela-de-links-Figma", live: "https://matheusabib.github.io/Tela-de-links-Figma/", description: "Portfólio de designs UI/UX criados no Figma", tags: ["HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript"] }, { id: 18, title: "Conversor de Moedas", title_key: "project_conversor", category: "Web Tool", filter: "motion", stack: "frontend-only", image: "/assets/img/portfolio/Conversor-de-Moedas.png", github: "https://github.com/MatheusAbib/Conversor-de-Moedas", live: "https://matheusabib.github.io/Conversor-de-Moedas/", description: "Conversor em tempo real usando API de cotações", tags: ["HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript", "API"] }, { id: 19, title: "Yummy Lamen - Restaurante de Lamen", title_key: "project_lamen", category: "Website", filter: "web", stack: "frontend-only", image: "/assets/img/portfolio/Yummy-Lamen.png", github: "https://github.com/MatheusAbib/Restaurante-Lamen", live: "https://matheusabib.github.io/Restaurante-Lamen/", description: "Site para restaurante especializado em lamen japonês", tags: ["HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript"] }, { id: 20, title: "Cartas do Destino - Tarot Online", title_key: "project_tarot", category: "Website", filter: "web", stack: "fullstack", image: "/assets/img/portfolio/Tarot-Online.png", github: "https://github.com/MatheusAbib/Consulta-de-Tarot", live: "https://matheusabib.github.io/Consulta-de-Tarot/", description: "Plataforma de consultas de tarot dinâmico", tags: ["HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript", "PHP", "Docker"] }, { id: 21, title: "Página de Login", title_key: "project_login", category: "Web Tool", filter: "motion", stack: "fullstack angular-badge", image: "/assets/img/portfolio/Pagina-de-Login.png", github: "https://github.com/MatheusAbib/Pagina-de-login", live: "https://pagina-de-login.up.railway.app/login", description: "Sistema de autenticação completo com Java Spring e TypeScript", tags: ["HTML", "SCSS", "Java", "TypeScript", "H2-Database", "Authentication"] } ]; const filters = [ { key: '*', label: 'filter_all' }, { key: 'web', label: 'filter_websites' }, { key: 'links', label: 'filter_links' }, { key: 'motion', label: 'filter_tools' }, { key: 'brand', label: 'filter_fun' } ]; const filteredProjects = activeFilter === '*' ? projects : projects.filter(project => project.filter === activeFilter); const getStackBadgeClass = (stack) => { if (stack.includes('angular-badge')) return 'stack-badge angular-badge'; if (stack.includes('fullstack')) return 'stack-badge fullstack'; return 'stack-badge frontend-only'; }; const getTagClass = (tag) => { const tagClasses = { 'HTML': 'html-tag', 'CSS': 'css-tag', 'JavaScript': 'js-tag', 'Java': 'java-tag', 'MySQL': 'mysql-tag', 'TypeScript': 'typescript-tag', 'SCSS': 'css-tag', 'PHP': 'php-tag', 'Docker': 'docker-tag', 'API': 'api-tag', 'Canvas API': 'canvas-tag', 'Date API': 'date-tag', 'Web Audio API': 'audio-tag', 'Charts': 'chart-tag', 'Authentication': 'auth-tag', 'H2-Database': 'mysql-tag' }; return tagClasses[tag] || 'js-tag'; }; return (

Meus Projetos

    {filters.map((filter) => (
  • setActiveFilter(filter.key)} > {filter.key === '*' ? 'Todos' : filter.key === 'web' ? 'Sites' : filter.key === 'links' ? 'Tela de Links' : filter.key === 'motion' ? 'Ferramentas' : 'Diversão'}
    • ))}
{filteredProjects.map((project) => (
{project.live ? ( ) : project.preview ? ( ) : null}
{project.category}

{project.title}

{project.tags.map((tag, index) => ( {tag} ))}

{project.description}

{project.stack.includes('angular') ? 'Angular' : project.stack.includes('fullstack') ? 'Full Stack' : 'Front-end'}
))}
); }; export default Portfolio;
